name: GYRO PRO
description:
This is an arcade game where you are a spaceship that has to survive lots of enemies on a closed room.

In this game you are always advancing, your only options are shooting and rotating. Try to achieve as many points as possible!

But make no mistake, despite this being an arcade game there is a final boss. There's a story-line and characters with backstories. Some of them will try to help you and others will try to kill you.

(not to be taken too seriously)
